alert.note: Alert for Dakota; Dixon (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued July 24 at 3:53AM CDT until July 24 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 542 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 9 AM CDT THIS MORNING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN IOWA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 2 COUNTIES IN NORTHWEST IOWA PLYMOUTH IN WEST CENTRAL IOWA WOODBURY IN NEBRASKA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 2 COUNTIES IN NORTHEAST NEBRASKA DAKOTA DIXON IN SOUTH DAKOTA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 6 COUNTIES IN SOUTHEAST SOUTH DAKOTA BON HOMME CLAY HUTCHINSON TURNER UNION YANKTON THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ALCESTER, ALLEN, AVON, BERESFORD, CENTERVILLE, CHANCELLOR, CLAYTON, ELK POINT, FREEMAN, HURLEY, IRENE, JEFFERSON, LE MARS, MARION, MENNO, NORTH SIOUX CITY, PARKER, PARKSTON, PONCA, SCOTLAND, SIOUX CITY, SOUTH SIOUX CITY, SPRINGFIELD, TABOR, TRIPP, TYNDALL, VERMILLION, VIBORG, WAKEFIELD, AND YANKTON.
